job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree or 6 years or more years of work experience

jd: From: Srivalli, Fluxteksolutions srivalli@fluxteksol.com Reply to: srivalli@fluxteksol.com Job Title: Oracle DBA w/TS Job Location: (Remote) Job Duration: + 12 Months Experience: 5+ Visa Status: USC --- TOP SECURITY clearance CERITIFICATE active We really need someone who is hands on on: 1) RAC 2) Goldengate 3) Standby Database creation 4) Performance Tuning 5) Goldengate Replication/GG Replication Data Guard Job Description: • Bachelor’s degree or 6 yrs. or more years of work experience. • Experience administering Oracle 19c/12c/11g RAC databases and PostgreSQL • Solid working experience on Oracle Exadata and ZFS Storage Appliances. • Experience on UNIX/Linux and shell scripting Even better if you have: • Experience with planning, building, implementing, administering, and maintaining on High Availability (HA) Setup of Oracle Real Application Clustering (RAC) database on Oracle 11g/12c/19c RDBMS, Grid infrastructure (GI), Automatic Storage Management (ASM), Data Guard and applying patches of GI and Oracle 11g/12c/19c RDBMS software binaries on Unix/Linux environments. • Experience in Oracle multitenant architecture, Container database, PDB hot clones, PDB refresh, relocation, plug/unplug and PDB level failover capability with Data Guard Broker. • Strong Working knowledge in performance analysis, tuning, ensures optimal database performance through exhaustive pre-service testing and ongoing real-time monitoring using Oracle Enterprise manager, SQL Tuning advisor, AWR, ADDM, ASH and other tools & techniques. • Experience with Performance Tuning & Troubleshooting and find a quicker resolution. • Experience with Software Products: Oracle 12c/19c, RMAN, Oracle Data Guard (Physical and Active), Golden Gate, Partitioning, Advanced Security, OEM 13c, Exadata with Extreme Flash Storage including patching/upgrade/Provisioning/monitoring.
